name: Creature Hunt
description: Creature Hunt is a combination of a survival horror and a hunting simulator. According to some articles in the local press, a few days ago several bodies of dead tourists were found in the woods of North Carolina.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 Storage: 1 GB available space
